sections.heading: Information We Collect
sections.text: We collect your name, email address, phone number, and workshop enrollment details.

sections.heading: How We Use Your Information
sections.text: Your information is used only for workshop registration, updates, and learning communication.

sections.heading: Data Protection
sections.text: We do not sell or share your personal data. All data is stored securely.

sections.heading: Communication
sections.text: By registering, you agree to receive workshop-related emails and WhatsApp updates.
